mapper.select: select r.* from ums_admin_role_relation ar left join ums_role r on ar.role_id = r.id where ar.admin_id = #{adminId}

select p.* from ums_admin_role_relation ar left join ums_role on ar.role_id = r.id left join ums_role_permission_relation rp on r.id = rp.role_id left join ums_permission on rp.permission_id = p.id where ar.admin_id = #{adminId} and p.id is not null and p.id not in ( select p.id from ums_admin_permission_relation ap left join ums_permission p on ap.permission_id = p.id where pr.type = -1 and pr.admin_id = #{adminId} ) UNION SELECT p.* FROM ums_admin_permission_relation pr LEFT JOIN ums_permission p ON pr.permission_id = p.id WHERE pr.type = 1 AND pr.admin_id = #{adminId}
